devdoc.details: This contract acts as a decentralized escrow system for the ConfidentialFundraising platform. It manages encrypted ETH balances, handles fund locking for active campaigns, and enables privacy-preserving withdrawals through FHE-based balance verification. Key Features: - Encrypted balance tracking for all users - Campaign-specific fund locking mechanism - Decryption-based withdrawal authorization - Automatic balance permission management - Support for multiple simultaneous campaign locks per user Security Model: - Only the authorized campaign contract can lock/unlock/transfer funds - Users must decrypt their available balance before withdrawal - All encrypted operations use FHEVM for on-chain privacy

deposit().details: The deposited amount is encrypted on-chain and added to the user's balance. Resets any cached decrypted balance values. Grants necessary FHE permissions to the user and campaign contract.

getAvailableBalance().details: The balance must be decrypted first by calling requestAvailableBalanceDecryption(). Returns the cached decrypted value if not expired.

returns._0: The available balance in wei (total balance minus locked amounts)

getAvailableBalanceStatus().details: Useful for checking if decryption is in progress or if cache is expired

returns.availableAmount: The cached available balance (0 if not decrypted)
returns.cacheExpiry: The timestamp when the cached value expires

getEncryptedBalance().details: Returns the raw encrypted value. Only the user and authorized contracts can decrypt this value.

getLockedAmount(uint16).details: Returns the raw encrypted value representing funds locked for this campaign.

returns._0: The encrypted locked amount as euint64

getTotalLocked().details: Returns the sum of all campaign locks for this user.

returns._0: The total encrypted locked amount as euint64

lockFunds(address,uint16,bytes32).details: Called exclusively by the campaign contract when a user contributes. Operates entirely on encrypted values using FHE. If insufficient funds are available, safely locks 0 instead of reverting. Invalidates cached available balance.

requestAvailableBalanceDecryption().details: Calculates available balance as (total balance - total locked) and initiates an asynchronous decryption request. The result will be cached after the callback. Use getAvailableBalance() to retrieve the decrypted value.

setCampaignContract(address).details: Can only be called once by the owner during initial setup. This address will have exclusive permission to lock, unlock, and transfer user funds.

params._campaignContract: The address of the ConfidentialFundraising contract

transferLockedFunds(address,address,uint.details: Called by the campaign contract when a campaign succeeds. Moves encrypted funds from the contributor's balance to the campaign owner's balance within the vault. Does not transfer actual ETH - funds remain in the vault.

params.campaignId: The ID of the successful campaign
params.campaignOwner: The address of the campaign owner

returns._0: The encrypted locked amount that was transferred

unlockFunds(address,uint16).details: Called by the campaign contract when a campaign is cancelled or fails to reach its target. Returns funds to the user's available balance without transferring ETH.

withdraw(uint64).details: Users must first decrypt their available balance. The decryption acts as authorization proof for the withdrawal. Resets the cached balance after withdrawal.

params.amount: The amount to withdraw in wei

devdoc.title: ShareVault

HandlesAlreadySavedForRequestID().notice: Returned if some handles were already saved for corresponding ID.

InvalidKMSSignatures().notice: Returned if the returned KMS signatures are not valid.

NoHandleFoundForRequestID().notice: Returned if there was not handle found for the requested ID.

DecryptionFulfilled(uint256).notice: This event is emitted when requested decryption has been fulfilled.

deposit().notice: Deposits ETH into the vault as an encrypted balance

getAvailableBalance().notice: Retrieves the user's decrypted available balance

getAvailableBalanceStatus().notice: Retrieves the decryption status and cached available balance

getEncryptedBalance().notice: Retrieves the user's encrypted total balance

getLockedAmount(uint16).notice: Retrieves the user's encrypted locked amount for a specific campaign

getTotalLocked().notice: Retrieves the user's total encrypted locked amount across all campaigns

lockFunds(address,uint16,bytes32).notice: Locks encrypted funds for a specific campaign

requestAvailableBalanceDecryption().notice: Requests decryption of the user's available balance

setCampaignContract(address).notice: Sets the authorized campaign contract address

transferLockedFunds(address,address,uint.notice: Transfers locked funds from contributor to campaign owner

unlockFunds(address,uint16).notice: Unlocks funds previously locked for a campaign

withdraw(uint64).notice: Withdraws unlocked funds from the vault

userdoc.notice: Secure vault for managing encrypted user balances and campaign fund locks
